education.degree: B.Tech, Computer Science and Business Systems

responsibilities: Led robotics programming workshops, designed and presented a self-balancing bot project to audience

certifications.name: MHI Certification Course
certifications.details: Gained foundational knowledge in ROS, Autonomous mobile navigation, SCARA bots

projects.title: Kidney Stone Detection using Transfer Learning
projects.description: Developed a Deep Learning model to classify kidney stones from CT scan images, aiming to improve diagnostic accuracy
details: Applied Transfer Learning techniques, fine-tuning pre-trained Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) models (ResNet50) on a kidney stone image dataset
Implemented image preprocessing and data augmentation to enhance model performance and generalization

projects.title: Habit Tracker Application
projects.description: Developed a full-stack application using React.js, MongoDB, and Python to help users monitor and manage daily habits effectively
details: Designed an interactive and user-friendly React.js frontend for adding, editing, deleting, and tracking habits
Implemented server-side logic and RESTful APIs in Python for secure data handling and communication
Utilized MongoDB for efficient NoSQL database storage and retrieval of user data, habit details, and progress
Included features like real-time updates, progress visualization, and user authentication

projects.title: Self-Balancing Bot
projects.description: Designed, built, and programmed a two-wheeled self-balancing robot using Arduino and IMU sensors
details: Demonstrated proficiency in embedded systems, sensor fusion, and real-time control
Implemented a PID control algorithm in C++ to maintain balance, achieving stable operation

projects.title: Gesture-Controlled Robot
projects.description: Developed a robot using Arduino, ultrasonic sensors, and motor drivers
details: Executed real-time gesture recognition with Python and OpenCV, demonstrating skills in robotics and computer vision

interests: Robotics and machine learning applications, with a focus on wireless and embedded systems
Cricket, adventurous activities (parasailing, ski boating, trekking)
Active participant in debates and presentations, enhancing communication skills
Collaborated on short film and article about child labor awareness, demonstrating social responsibility
NCC Cadet, participated in pre-national camps, and developed leadership skills
